# Load required packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
library(tidymodels)
library(parsnip)
library(ranger)
library(dials)
library(glmnet)
library(here)
```

# set random seed for reproducibility
```{r} 
# set random seed for reproducibility
rngseed <-set.seed(1234)

# load the clean data
clean_data <- readRDS(here("ml-models-exercise", "clean_data.rds"))

```


```{r}
# Use mutate so 7 and 88 can = 3 for the variable 'RACE'
clean_data <- clean_data %>% mutate(RACE = ifelse(RACE %in% c(7,88), 3, RACE))
```
